pkgmetadata.longdescription:
GStreamer plugin for the JPEG format.
Includes the following elements: * jpegdec - Decode images from JPEG format * jpegenc - Encode images in JPEG format
In 0.10 only (deprecated): * smokedec - Decode video from Smoke format * smokeenc - Encode images into the Smoke format
See the installed README if interested what the Smoke codec is.
